title: Tron partners with turbulent Curve Finance to launch stUSDT pool amid market chaos
description:

title: Binance Japan Returns With 34 Token Listing and Spot-Trading Service
description:
Binance Japan is preparing for its anticipated launch in August, as announced on Japan’s news platform, Coinpost. Alongside the exchange’s native token “Build and Build” (BNB), formerly known as Binance Coin, Binance will also be featuring 34 tokens, including BTC, ETC, DOT, QTUM, ALGO, ETH, and ADA.
